participant_1.background:
I remember playing the violin for my family at the holidays and seeing the look on their faces as they listened.
i feel that i can t live up to many people s standards.
I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents.
I like to dye my hair fire engine red, because it's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything.
I enjoy entertaining my former students and catching up on their lives.

participant_2.background:
I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that they love me and I hope that they would accept me for who I am.
I check my phone.
I give my dog a big hug and some breakfast before I leave for work.
i work in retail.
I love to start my day with some quiet time to myself.

content.text: Good morning! I hope you have a wonderful day!
Good morning to you too! I hope you do as well!
Thank you! What's the first thing you do when you wake up in the morning?
I check my phone, then I give my dog a big hug and some breakfast before I leave for work.
I love dogs! What breed is yours?
He's a goldendoodle. He's the sweetest dog I've ever met.
They're such lovable dogs! What do you do for work?
I work in retail. I love it, but it can be a lot of work sometimes.
I'm sure it can be, but it's important to have a job you love.
Yeah, it really is. I'm lucky to have a job I enjoy.
Me too. I work as a teacher. I love working with kids.
That sounds like a really rewarding job!
It is! I love seeing the kids learn and grow.
I'm sure you're a great teacher.
Thank you! I try my best.
Well, it sounds like you're having a great morning. I'm going to get ready for work now.
